gamerule.disableBiomeFreezeIce: Disable water freezing due to biome temperature
gamerule.disableBiomeFreezeIce.descripti: If true, water placed in the world will not freze by natural means, either biome, temperature, or elevation
gamerule.disableBlockGravity.description: Gravity related blocks will not fall when placed or updated  (sand, gravel, concrete, ...)
gamerule.disableCriticalHits.description: Applies to all regular critical hits made
gamerule.disableCropGrowth.description: Crops do not grow naturally from time passing (wheat, cactus, etc), however bonemeal does still work
gamerule.disableSaplingGrowth.descriptio: Saplings growth is blocked, both from nature and from bonemeal
gamerule.disableDecayLeaves.description: Natural leaf decay turned off, even if not placed by a player
gamerule.disableDecayCoral.description: Coral blocked from going grey when dry
gamerule.disableHunger.description: Players hunger bar is hidden, and it is always treated as full.  Food items are unchanged
gamerule.disableFarmlandTrampling.descri: Farmland is as strong as dirt, trampling does not destroy it
gamerule.disableGenerateStone.descriptio: No cobblestone or stone generated from lava and water touching
gamerule.disableGenerateObsidian.descrip: When source lava blocks get wet, it stays lava and does not become obsidian
gamerule.disableLightMeltIce: Disable ice melting from things like light levels
gamerule.disableLightMeltIce.description: Ice will not melt from things like sunlight and torches
gamerule.disableMobItemPickup: Disable item pickup when any Mob joins the world
gamerule.disableMobItemPickup.descriptio: This gamerule is applied to mobs as they are loaded into the world, and blocks them from picking up items
gamerule.disablePetFriendlyFire.descript: If an animal is tamed, its owner cannot harm it (horses, cats, parrots, ...)
gamerule.disableVillagerTrading.descript: The villager trading window cannot be opened by players
gamerule.disableTargetingPlayers.descrip: Mobs still spawn but treat players invisible, they do not track or target players (AI only; no spawning changes; any difficulty)
gamerule.disableLightningTransform: Disable mobs from transforming when struck by lightning
gamerule.disableLightningTransform.descr: Lightning will not mutate anything (charged creepers, villagers, etc)
gamerule.disablePortalCreationNether.des: Portals can still be entered but not ignited
gamerule.disablePortalCreationEnd.descri: Portals can still be entered, but players cannot socket ender eyes into the portal frame
gamerule.doArmorStandWeapons: Allow armor stands to have arms
gamerule.doArmorStandWeapons.description: Sneak-right-click to swap main and offhand with armor stand
gamerule.doCactusGrowthUnlimited.descrip: Cactus can grow past 3 up to 256 tall
gamerule.doMapsAlwaysUpdate.description: All maps in inventory update as if held by player
gamerule.doEyesAlwaysBreak: Ender Eyes always break when thrown
gamerule.doEyesAlwaysBreak.description: Ender Eye will break every time and not drop after thrown
gamerule.doInstantEating.description: No food eating delay, is consumed right away
gamerule.doInstantExp.description: Player can instantly pickup every XP orb with no delay
gamerule.doSugarGrowthUnlimited: Sugar cane grows past 3 up to 256 tall
gamerule.doLilypadsBreak: Lily Pads break and prevent falldamage
gamerule.doLilypadsBreak.description: Lily Pads break when player falls on them, preventing damage
gamerule.doNetherVoidAbove.description: The roof of the nether is treated the same as below and void damage is dealt
gamerule.doFriendlyIronGolems.descriptio: Iron golems never harm or target players
gamerule.keepInventoryArmor.description: If this is false and keepInventory=true, then drop armor on death
gamerule.keepInventoryExperience.descrip: If this is false and keepInventory=true, then lose all XP on death
gamerule.mobGriefingCreeper.description: Set false for this mob to ignore the gamerule (requires mobGriefing=true)
gamerule.mobGriefingEnderman.description: Set false for this mob to ignore the gamerule (requires mobGriefing=true)
gamerule.mobGriefingVillager.description: Set false for this mob to ignore the gamerule (requires mobGriefing=true)
gamerule.mobGriefingZombie.description: Set false for this mob to ignore the gamerule (requires mobGriefing=true)
gamerule.mobGriefingWither.description: Set false for this mob to ignore the gamerule (requires mobGriefing=true)
gamerule.mobGriefingRavager.description: Set false for this mob to ignore the gamerule (requires mobGriefing=true)
gamerule.mobGriefingSilverfish.descripti: Set false for this mob to ignore the gamerule (requires mobGriefing=true)
gamerule.mobGriefingGhast.description: Set false for this mob to ignore the gamerule (requires mobGriefing=true)
gamerule.mobGriefingBlaze.description: Set false for this mob to ignore the gamerule (requires mobGriefing=true)
gamerule.mobGriefingSnowgolem.descriptio: Set false for this mob to ignore the gamerule (requires mobGriefing=true)
gamerule.pearlDamage.description: Damage from thrown Ender Pearls always prevented
